title: FONT I.D. FUN! :)
content:
Hi!

Looking for an I.D. on this typeface - “Rangers Football Club” not the wacky bits in the middle.

Thanks for your help!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005238im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/rangers_5660.jpg)

author: Altered.Towers

comments.content: hrm...think i figured it out...sorry to bother ya’ll...believe it’s a bold-y version of Charcoal?
